title: 15 Perches facing a MAIN ROAD in KOHUWALA
details:
KOHUWALA – 15 perches of Commercial Property, facing a very prominent Main Road that is being currently processed to be greatly widened and with 62 ft of wide Road Frontage !

Ideally suitable for a Car Sale, Offices, Show Room and Upper Floors for Apartments / Restaurants.

Rs 5.25 M per perch closely negotiable.

Title acceptable for Bank Lending.
Strictly NO Brokers
Contact: 0094772280690
